entry.title: lgallard/terraform-aws-cognito-user-pool
entry.summary: Terraform module to create Amazon Cognito User Pools, configure its attributes and resources such as app clients, domain, resource servers. Amazon Cognito User Pools provide a secure user directory that scales to hundreds of millions of users.
